channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 98, "The Landsman Game Challenge"
channel.description:
In this episode we discuss solo parenting, Disney on Ice, future conference plans, and a plan to live stream Ian playing video games.
Update: [Here's the stream video of our PUBG game.](https://t.co/IbiFVATljR)
[Listen to the episode.](http://bootstrapped.fm/98-the-landsman-game-challenge/)
[Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. Sign up today and get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)
